description: Details required for Condition 11 (Sustainability) of planning permission 21/04084/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development with removal of Condition 6 (Privacy Screening) of Planning Permission ref: 21/02905/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to amend Condition 1 (Approved Plans) and Condition 5 (Fenestration) of planning permission ref: 20/01700/FUL (Erection of a two storey detached house and detached linked two storey annex with single storey detached garage (following demolition of existing house, garage, surrounding terraces and annex building) dated 06/11/2020. Variation to include alterations to layout and footprint at ground floor level, lowering eaves line and changes to elevations (Condition 1) and alter the wording of Condition 5 removing the words referring to the study from the condition) dated 14/12/2021. Condition 6 to be omitted as rear balcony of west wing is removed, balcony of main dwelling reduced in size, and the rear terraces now proposed at lower level)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
